49.eng-name: The Book of the Etiquette of Judges

hadiths.text: It was narrated that 'Aishah said:"Hind came to the Messenger of Allah [SAW] and said : 'O Messenger of Allah, Abu Sufyan is a stingy man who does not spend enough on my child and I. Can I take from his wealth without him realizing?' He said: 'Take what is sufficient for you and your child on a reasonable basis

chapter.ara-name: باب قَضَاءِ الْحَاكِمِ عَلَى الْغَائِبِ إِذَا عَرَفَهُ
chapter.eng-name: The Judge Passing a Judgment on Someone in Absentia, if he Knows Who he is
